info.name: Cellularism Automatable Techique
info.description: Remix of "Cellular Automata Technicol (459" by FabriceNeyret2

renderpass.code:
// simplified from https://shadertoy.com/view/tlKSWD (1823 chars)
void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 u) { mi(o,u); }
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 o, vec2 u) { mi(o,u); }
renderpass.name: Buffer A

renderpass.code:
#define L(t) L[ ( t + iFrame / int(max(R.x,R.y)) ) % L.length() ]                  //
#define V(s) int( texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2( C+R -D + s vec2(-D.y,D) ),0).a > 0.)//
int[] L = int[]( 22, 30, 45, 54, 57, 60, 62, 73, 75, 86, 89, 110);                 //
#define mi(O,U)                                  \
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy/2., D = O.wx,              \
          C = U-R, A = abs(C);                          \
    int   r =   C.x >  A.y ?           L( )             \
              : C.y >  A.x ? D = D.yx, L(2)             \
              : C.x < -A.y ? D =-D,    L(3)             \
              :            ( D =-D.yx, L(4) ),          \
          k = V(-) *5 + V(0.*) *3 + V();                \
    float l = length( C -= 5.*D ),                      \
          d = dot(C,D);                                 \
    O =   d*d < 1.  ? vec4( l > 1.)                     \
        : d/l < .607 || (r >> k) % 2 < 1 ? O-O          \
        : .7 + .7 * cos( .78*vec4(k)  + vec4(0,23,21,0) )
renderpass.name: Common
